idea-plugin.name: Mockkator
idea-plugin.description:
This is a simple plugin that takes care of generating Mockk's boilerplate code for you. It searches for the tested class automatically based on the name of your test, and instantiate it with all its fields mocked. If you update your tested class, you can run the plugin again and it will add what is missing automatically.
Usage
At the top of your tested class, hit alt+insert and select Mockk Code.
Contribute
Feel free to create an issue on Github or even to open your own PR. I developed this project for personal usage, but i'm open to suggestions or improvement ideas.

action.description: Generates Mockk boilerplate code for the tested class
